alert.note: Alert for Ventura County Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued March 07 at 2:59AM PST until March 07 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 2 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Frost Advisory, temperatures between 32 and 35 degrees will result in frost formation near Ojai. For the Wind Advisory, northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected, mainly eastern portions. * WHERE...Ventura County Interior Valleys. * WHEN...For the Frost Advisory, until 9 AM PST this morning. For the Wind Advisory, from 8 AM this morning to 2 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Frost can damage sensitive plants and harm pets if left unprotected.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
